R0_RecHeight_Num.name: R0_RecHeight_Num

R0_RecordedHeight.name: R0_RecordedHeight
R0_RecordedHeight.description: Derived and pseudo-anonymised full date. Day, month and year components are combined and the resulting date is shifted by a participant-specific offset. If the day component is missing it is set to 15 before shifting. If the month component is missing (and a year is present) the date is treated as year-only, anchored at 1 July (day 1, month 7) of that year before shifting. If day and month are both missing the same rule applies. If the year component is missing the derived value is null.
